Package machinelearningproject

Class DataAnalyser

java.lang.Object
machinelearningproject.DataAnalyser
Direct Known Subclasses:
NaiveBayes
public class DataAnalyser extends Object
This is a class that is used to perform methods which separates the data of a CSV file into easier variables to manipulate such as columns, features and rows.
Since:
13/03/2022
